item.description:
A group of faculty, graduate students and undergraduate students from Boston College William F. Connell School of Nursing, including Katie Q who comes to TMIRCE when her schedule allows, are going to Haiti! The group will be in Haiti on the one-year anniversary of the earthquake to provide nursing care to Haitian patients.

This funds from this 5k race will be used exclusively to purchase medications and medical supplies for Haitians. CHECK OUT THEIR BLOG: csoninhaiti.blogspot.com

All are welcome: students, families, and runners/walkers of all ages! You may WALK or RUN! Free t-shirts to all registrants! DONATE to Circle of Hope, our umbrella organization. All donations are tax-deductable, and 100% goes to our supplies and efforts: http://www.circleofho...

And it's cheap... only $15!

All details and registration are here... http://www.active.com...

~ Martin

p.s. you're responsible for your own registration fees etc.!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Boston College 5K for Haiti
